> <OLD>
>
> As the black-colored Predecon shuttle came into range of their =
base in the Valley Mine Pentatron he began picking up some unusual signals =
of a group of powerful bots, but as far as he could tell, they were not mem=
bers of the Bushido Predcons.=A0 In an effort to stay off radar, he turned =
the scanners to passive then activated the craft's jamming devices.=A0 Then=
 taking a wide approach away from the more populated areas of the city, he =
slowly descended toward the base.

<NEW>

As the shuttle flew in, doing its=
 best to hide its presence, twin jets
shot out from the city. They both reg=
estered as Predacon, but thier
IFF signatures also registered them as some =
sort of security force of
the mining city.

Thier engines lit through the s=
kies, temporarilly leaving large trails
through the everpresent smog that h=
ung in the skies like brown fog.
They did not seem to notice the dark color=
ed shuttle that had passed
through the clouds, or did they?

With agile pre=
cision they began to bank around, making a circling arc
around the city. If=
 they had seen the shuttle, perhaps they were
swinging around to engage or =
perhaps this was part of thier patrol
route?

So far no communication was a=
ttempted with the shuttle. However, seen
or not, if the shuttle remained in=
 the air the jets would notice it in
a few moments as they continued to whe=
el around!

(TAG)

Preston
